greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangular table T(n,k) = n! / Product_{m=(n-floor((2n)/(3^k))) .. (n-floor((n)/(3^k)))} m, read by rows T(1,1), T(2,1), T(2,2), T(3,1), T(3,2), T(3,3), ...
comment: An auxiliary array for computing A088488.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1275; the first 50 rows of triangular table
example: The first rows of the triangular table:
program: (define (A254876bi n k) (/ (A000142 n) (mul A000027 (- n (floor->exact (/ (* 2 n) (expt 3 k)))) (- n (floor->exact (/ n (expt 3 k)))))))
(define (mul intfun lowlim uplim) (let multloop ((i lowlim) (res 1)) (cond ((> i uplim) res) (else (multloop (+ 1 i) (* res (intfun i)))))))
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 09 2015
